itunes:title: Drinkin' Bros Fake News 71 - Are They Going To Mute The Mics?
title: Drinkin' Bros Fake News 71 - Are They Going To Mute The Mics?
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Dan Hollaway, and Dakota Meyer and bring you the realest fake news of the week starting with the debate between Trump and Biden, will there be muted mics at the next one, was Biden wearing a wire, why Covid will have the most uneven econo...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Dan Hollaway, and Dakota Meyer and bring you the realest fake news of the week starting with the debate between Trump and Biden, will there be muted mics at the next one, was Biden wearing a wire, why Covid will have the most uneven economic recovery in US history, and how there has been an arrest in the Compton police officer shootings. Special Guest Chef Rico from Nixta stops by with the best tacos in all of Austin, Texas!

ghostbed.com/drinkinbros
